messages.msgSnippet: ... bible. I was reffered to the site by a Unitatrian Universalist intern minister with a great sense of humor. I have read a couple of the stories, and had a
messages.messageBody:
>>I found this site a great, however I am irreverent about religion and the
bible. I was reffered to the site by a Unitatrian Universalist intern
minister with a great sense of humor. I have read a couple of the stories,
and had a good laugh. You may be interested in the, um, alternative
presentation of Scripture at <outbind://60/www.thebricktestament.com>
www.thebricktestament.com. Truly, God works in mysterious ways...

WARNING: People who are christian homeschoolers will probably not enjoy it.
<<

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=--=

I don't think a warning is necessary ;p

My deacon, bible study goin, worship team leader of a husband showed our son
this site a while back and they both just loved it.

Krisula
